author: Staff Reporter
text:
Reva University celebrated its Founder’s Day with aplomb on Wednesday. Apart from distributing clothes to government school children of Kattigenahalli and Dwarakanagar, scholarships were presented to poor and meritorious students.

For the first time, the Rukmini Educational Charitable Trust presented the Reva Lifetime Award to Indian Space Research Organisation Chairman A.S. Kiran Kumar. The award comprises Rs. 1 lakh cash component and a citation.

Shyam Chetty, Director CSIR-NAL, was the chief guest on the occasion, according to a press release.
title: Reva University marks Founder’s Day
